headline: Trump signs stablecoin bill into law, capping string of 'Crypto Week' victories
summary: President Trump signed into law a bill that establishes the first federal framework for dollar-backed stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

headline: Is It Worth Investing in MasterCard (MA) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?

headline: Mastercard (MA) Expands Stablecoin Use With Fiserv FIUSD Integration
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) ranks among the best forever stocks to invest in. Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) stated on June 24 that it was strengthening its relationship with Fiserv by integrating its new FIUSD token into a variety of Mastercard products and services. This will boost the use and adoption of stablecoins for their shared customers globally. […]
